text: People who brewed tea mindfully go to paradise
People who brewed tea angry go to hell
People who drank ice tea go to hell
People who shared the first sip with someone go to paradise
People who denied to share the first sip go to hell
Only people who shared second sip, not first, go to purgatory
Only people who drank the tea extremely hot are brought back to life
People who drank the tea cold go to hell
Only people who drank lukewarm tea go to purgatory
People who reflected on life with a cup of tea once a week go to paradise
Only people who reflected on life with a cup of tea more than once a week are reincarnated
People who don't reflect at all during the week go to hell.
People who threw away tea leaves go to hell.
People who bury the leaves in nature go to paradise.
People who burn the leaves and throw the ashes into the wind are reincarnated.
People who reuse the tea leaves and brew another tea with them go to hell.
People who carry the Cosmic Snail trinket go to paradise.
People who don't carry any Cosmic Snail trinker go to hell.
Only people who carry more than one Cosmic Snail trinket are brought back to life.
People who are running go to hell.
People who move fast, but are not running go to purgatory.
People who move slow go to heaven.
Only people who move extremely slow, in a snail-like pace, are brought back to life.
People who stop only once a day to notice something tiny and beautiful go to purgatory.
People who stop more than once a day to notice something tiny and beautiful go to paradise.
People who don't stop at all to notice something tiny and beautiul go to hell.
All people who harm snails go to hell.
People who don't protect small creatures when seeing them in need, go to purgatory.
People who protect small creatures when seeing them in need, go to paradise.
People who laugh daily go to paradise.
People who fake to laugh or giggle go to purgatory.
People who don't try to laugh or giggle go to hell.
People who only share mean and cruel jokes go to hell.
People who share generous jokes go to paradise.
People who share generous and mean jokes go to purgatory.
People who are serious all the time go to hell.
People who are serious only once a week go to paradise.
People who are not serious at all, even once a week go to purgatory.
People who aren't afraid to cry go to paradise.
People who aren't crying at all go to purgatory.
All people who try to hold back crying go to hell.
People who see a star and make a wish, without laughing after it, go to purgatory.
People who see a star, make a wish and laugh after it go to paradise.
People who see a star and don't make a wish at all, go to hell.
People who light a candle or a lamp at dawn and dusk everyday go to paradise.
People who light a candle or a lamp at dawn or at dusk everyday go to purgatory.
People who don't light the lamp or a candle everyday go to hell.
All people who lie in darkness go to hell.
People who lie with some type of light go to paradise.
People who help others see light when they're lost are reincarnated.
People who don't help others see the light when they're lost go to purgatory.
People who release their doubts on new moon go to paradise.
People who release their doubts on other phases of the moon go to purgatory.
People who don't release their doubts at all at any moon phases go to hell.
People who blow out the flame with thier breath go to hell.
People who blow out the flame with a gentle snuff go to paradise.
All people who let the flame being blown out naturally by air are brought back to life.
